org.ow2.proactive.resourcemanager.nodesource.infrastructure

Class SSHInfrastructure

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.proactive.resourcemanager.nodesource.infrastructure.InfrastructureManager
      • org.ow2.proactive.resourcemanager.nodesource.infrastructure.HostsFileBasedInfrastructureManager
        • org.ow2.proactive.resourcemanager.nodesource.infrastructure.SSHInfrastructure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, NodeSourcePlugin

    public class SSHInfrastructure
extends HostsFileBasedInfrastructureManager
    Acquires nodes over SSH given a list of hosts

    Assumes all necessary ProActive configuration has already been performed: ssh username, key directory, etc. This class won't handle it, see SSHClient.

    Also assumes JRE and Scheduling installation paths are the same on all hosts.

    If you need more control over you deployment, you may consider using GCMInfrastructure instead, which contains the functionalities of this Infrastructure, but requires more configuration.

    Since:
    ProActive Scheduling 2.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • startNodeImpl

        protected void startNodeImpl(HostTracker hostTracker,
                             int nbNodes,
                             List<String> depNodeURLs)
                      throws RMException
        Internal node acquisition method

        Starts a PA runtime on remote host using SSH, register it manually in the nodesource.

        Specified by:
        startNodeImpl in class HostsFileBasedInfrastructureManager
        Parameters:
        hostTracker - The host on which one the node will be started
        nbNodes - number of nodes to deploy
        depNodeURLs - list of deploying or lost nodes urls created
        Throws:
        RMException - acquisition failed

      • initializePersistedInfraVariables

        protected void initializePersistedInfraVariables()
        Description copied from class: InfrastructureManager
        This method should initialize a value in the runtime variables map for all the runtime variables that will be used in the class. It is called at initialization time of the infrastructure, just before the InfrastructureManager.configure(Object...) method. This method runs with the write lock acquired.
        Overrides:
        initializePersistedInfraVariables in class HostsFileBasedInfrastructureManager
